spanish-language.name: Spanish
spanish-language.description:
<cy>ENG</c>: Translates most of the mod's dialogue in Spanish. Due to character limitations, there will be spelling errors.

<cy>ESP</c>: Traduce mayor parte del dialogo del mod en Espanol. Dado a las limitaciones de caracteres en el juego, habran errores ortograficos (como la falta de acentos)

dev-mode.name: Developer Mode
dev-mode.description: Enabling developer modes allows you to bypass most restrictions (like access to Online Menu)

bypass-levels.name: Level Bypass
bypass-levels.description: Unlocks all levels, disabling the progression system

bypass-vaults.name: Vault Bypass
bypass-vaults.description: Unlocks the vaults (You skip the requirements to open them)

empty-levels.name: Empty all levels
empty-levels.description: Turns all levels of the mod as empty templates (Just to test achievements and progression system)

restart-mod.name: Restart the mod
restart-mod.description: Resets everything from the mod the moment you enter the Menu layer. <cr>Only enable this</c> if you want to experience everything from the beginning.
